description: Users will be able to add funds to existing pools using the Avo token.
Enable users to set stop-loss and take-profit on all agent pools.

item: Utilization of Avo Tokens for Platform Transaction Fees (25% Discount)
description: Users can choose to pay for transaction fees with Avo Tokens. As a reward, a 25% transaction fee discount will be applied to all transactions paid for with Avo Tokens.
New pools can be opened and completely funded with Avo Tokens.
When closing positions in agents, your funds will be received in Avo Tokens.
Users can earn fees by referring new users to Avo, paid in Avo.
A detailed reward center will make it crystal clear how much you are earning from referral fees and saving by using Avo Tokens.
Introduction of a weekly Profit and Loss (PnL) leaderboard to highlight our top-performing users.

Migrate and expand our infrastructure for improved performance, reliability, and developer experience. This modernization will enable faster item delivery, enhanced system stability, better support for new items, and allow new engineers joining the team to get up to speed faster.

Launch our proprietary token metadata service that continuously monitors Solana tokens for price, volume, market cap, and liquidity data with appropirate fallback mechanisms. This further reduces third-party dependencies and provides more accurate, real-time token information.

Complete the transition of our core trading systems to a unified architecture. This includes migrating portfolio management, rebalancing algorithms, and position management to our new high-performance infrastructure. This will new agent listing, index creation, and creator portfolios to be super simple to launch.
We will onboard new devs to the avo team. Start scaling our infrastructure to own the Agent Capital Markets narrative.
Allows developers to earn fees by listing their agents on the platform, paid in Avo. Fees will be split 50/50 between Avo and the developer, after considering all referral and staking deductions.

Complete rollout of the next-gen Avo infrastructure with enhanced improved performance, control, and advanced cross-chain support gearing for the growing Avo ecosystem. Expect constant rollouts before the deadline.
Review the launch of the V2 Avo infrastructure and rectify any issues.

Finalized stack and development requirements of the native Avo mobile application for iOS and Android, bringing the full trading experience to mobile devices with real-time portfolio tracking and trading capabilities.

Enhanced closing mechanism with smart handling of all edge cases including dust amounts and failed closure swaps. The system automatically incinerates low-value balances (below $1) and closes token accounts to redeem locked SOL, ensuring efficient capital recovery.

Achieved approximately 112x cheaper swap costs for Avo agents through intelligent routing and optimization algorithms. This dramatic improvement significantly reduces trading fees for all users and enables more cost-effective portfolio rebalancing.

Launch the first alpha version of the Avo mobile app through TestFlight to a carefully selected group of early adopters and power users. This controlled rollout will focus on gathering critical feedback on core functionality, user experience, and identifying any critical bugs before wider distribution. Alpha testers will have direct communication channels with the development team to report issues and suggest improvements.

Launch of the first narrative-based index on Avo platform featuring the top 20 organic Solana tokens. This marks the beginning of Avo's index investing capabilities, allowing users to gain diversified exposure to entire narratives rather than individual token speculation.

Launch of Avo's Developer API in alpha, enabling select teams to build trading functionality and integrate Avo's infrastructure into their applications. This API allows developers to programmatically manage agents, execute trades, and access Avo's intelligent trading engine.

subItems.description: Private alpha testing of the Developer API with carefully selected partner teams to gather feedback and refine functionality
Deployment of Windmill and n8n instances to enable AI-powered trading workflows for Avo

description: Comprehensive suite of advanced trading controls giving users granular control over their agent behavior. Includes configurable band thresholds for portfolio rebalancing, minimum swap value settings to optimize transaction fees, smarter retry logic for failed transactions, and significantly improved pool activity logs for complete transparency.

subItems.description: User-configurable band thresholds for rebalancing triggers and minimum swap values to prevent unnecessary small transactions
Intelligent retry mechanism for failed transactions with exponential backoff and alternative routing
Much cleaner and more detailed pool logs providing clear visibility into all agent actions and decisions

description: Comprehensive redesign of Avo's homepage with a much fresher, modern interface that better showcases the platform's capabilities and improves user onboarding experience.

Expand the mobile app release to a larger test group with an initial controlled public beta. This phase introduces the app to a broader audience while maintaining quality controls and monitoring systems. Beta users will experience the full item set including portfolio tracking, agent management, and real-time trading capabilities. Feedback from this phase will drive final optimizations and item refinements before the official public launch.

Launch comprehensive tokenomics plan including: Revenue-backed staking with proportional fee distribution to $AVO stakers, automated buyback flywheel to grow team reserves and reduce circulating supply, revenue-backed burn mechanism permanently removing paid-for tokens from circulation (similar to HYPE/PUMP models), developer revenue-share pools for ecosystem contributors, and $AVO-backed community incentives funding hackathons, events, and developer onboarding programs to accelerate Avo's ecosystem growth.

Comprehensive review and analysis of beta testing results, including detailed examination of user feedback, crash reports, performance metrics, and usage patterns. This phase focuses on identifying and resolving any remaining issues, optimizing agent categorization and discovery items, refining the user interface based on real-world usage data, and implementing performance improvements. Final preparations for public release including app store optimization and marketing materials.

Full public release of Avo's Developer API, enabling any developer to build on top of Avo's infrastructure. This will open up the platform for third-party integrations, custom trading tools, and innovative applications built on Avo's intelligent trading engine.

subItems.description: Comprehensive tutorials and guides for deploying AI trading workflows using Windmill, n8n, and other automation tools with Avo's API
Complete API documentation with examples, SDKs, and integration guides for developers

description: Improved user interface for viewing detailed trade history and transaction logs. This will provide users with complete visibility into every action their agents take, including swap details, reasoning, and performance metrics for maximum transparency.

Expansion of Avo's index offerings beyond the initial Solana Top 20 Organic Index. Launch multiple narrative-based indexes covering DeFi, AI agents, memecoins, and other crypto sectors, enabling users to invest in entire market segments with a single click.

subItems.description: Curated index of top DeFi protocols and tokens on Solana
Index tracking the performance of AI agent tokens and ICM ecosystem projects
Tools allowing users and developers to create and deploy their own custom indexes on Avo
